title: What is the purpose of preservation? - Quora

response.answer_text: Preservation of what? People now preserve food in their home freezers or refrigerators till they are ready to consume it. Some people preserve food by fermentation over the length of some months Some people preserve by drying methods to prevent decay. Human bodies are preserved by various chemicals draining of blood and refilling veins and arteries with a preservation formula .The body is the dressed and face and hair arranged for the funeral service this is done in the Western world for temporary preservation and viewing before burial.

Preservation—The protection of cultural property through activities that minimize chemical and physical deterioration and damage and that prevent loss of informational content. The primary goal of preservation is to prolong the existence of cultural property.
